title: Image ratio
custom_expected: It will be 2 images available; first portrait orientation, second landscape orientation

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the story in portrait mode
AND user inspects the image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN image has 9:16 ratio

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the story in landscape mode
AND user inspects the image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN image has 16:9 ratio

custom_expected: THEN the sponsorship logo size should be 127x26

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN reactions are suppressed

suppressPoll=true
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see the reactions in the story

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN cta is suppressed

suppressOutlink=true
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see the cta in the story

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN More Info link in Game Story is suppressed

suppressDrawer=true
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see the More Info link in Game Story

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN CTA with sponsor is suppressed

suppressOutlinkSponsor=true
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see the CTA with sponsor

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN logo with sponsor is suppressed

suppressLogo=true
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see the logo on the cover slide

title: Non - play events
custom_steps:
WHEN user watches a non-play event story
AND story has players and/or team
custom_expected:
THEN team logo and headshot should be displayed on the game story
AND story should display the title and no description

title: Conviva - Reporting of Successful Video Playback
Conviva - Backgrounding, Phone/Tablet Sleep, Incoming Phone Call
custom_steps: When I background the app or put the phone/tablet to sleep or receive an incoming phone call
custom_expected: Then the background and foreground events should be reported

title: Conviva - Close of Session
custom_preconds: Given the video is being watched
custom_expected:
Then the monitoring session should be cleaned up
And the concurrent plays metric should be updated

title: Conviva - End of Session
custom_expected:
Then the monitoring session should be cleaned up
And the ended plays and concurrent plays metrics should be updated

title: Reactions
custom_expected: Applies to Player Story, Game Story, Game Preview Story, Personalized Story and Editorial Story

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is watching a story
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the reaction banner with heart and fire emoji
AND when story just open, then the reaction banner highlight heart and then fire

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the selected reaction is displayed for full width of the reaction banner
AND 100% is displayed underneath the reaction

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tries to unselect the reaction
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not able to change or unselect the reaction

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Game Story:

go to Scores 
go to game that already played
click 'Story'


Ex: https://www.mlb.com/stories/game/745496
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN game story is displayed
AND user sees the Game content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Player story: 

go to Players
select a player
click 'Watch Story'

Ex: https://www.mlb.com/stories/player/671096
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN player story is displayed
AND user sees the Player content

title: Day Parting Logic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an authenticated user
AND the user has a favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user loads the web page before the Flip Time (12am NY time)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render the MDS module

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user loads the web page after the Flip Time (12am NY time)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN regular story is displayed

title: User's first name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an authenticated user
AND the user has a favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN we know that users first name
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render Personalized Label

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN we do NOT know that users first name
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render Fallback Label

title: ES language
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an authenticated user
AND the user has a favorite team
AND watches the ES story
custom_expected: THEN all content is displayed in spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MDS display favorite team content and top plays of the day from previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a favorite team and followed team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MDS display favorite team, followed team content and top plays of the day from previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has no favorite team and no followed team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MDS  top plays of the day from previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a favorite team and favorite player
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MDS display favorite team content, favorite player and top plays of the day from previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a favorite team and followed team and favorite player
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MDS display favorite team, followed team content, favorite player and top plays of the day from previous day
